title: Jimmy and Shivi's Farmhouse Breakfast
overview: Join Jimmy Doherty and Shivi Ramoutar at Jimmy's Suffolk farm for the show weekends were made for! A series full of delicious food and drink, craft, animals and country life…there really is something for everyone. Each week Jimmy and Shivi will whip up a tasty meal or two on their outdoor kitchen and suggest some drinks to go with them. They'll try their hand at arts and crafts, from making terrariums to upcycling wooden pallets, and they'll be chatting to a different celeb face in every show, getting the lowdown on the worlds of entertainment and sports. As if that weren't enough, Jimmy will give viewers a unique behind the scenes glimpse into the lives of the animals at his wildlife park, and Shivi explores the local area meeting great characters with stories to tell and skills to share.Jimmy & Shivi's Farmhouse Breakfast really is everything you need for a fun-packed weekend!
